question: Which one of the following makes epiphyseal cailage matrix fail to calcify?
exp: In the absence of vitamin D, epiphyseal chondrocytes continue to proliferate, but their matrix does not calcify, which leads to rickets.

question: Fibro cailage is found in
exp: Fibrocailage is shock absorber which provides strength to cailage and is found in Interveebral disc. Costal cailage and nasal septum are made up of Hyaline Cailage. Auditory tube has elastic cailage.
